title: ISic020537. ISic020537
body:
Facsimile Images

πίη

Apparatus criticus

Text after Arena (IGASM 2)

English translation

Drink!

Italian translation

Bevi!

commentary

The inscription, on a kylix, seems likely to be read as πίῃ, second person of the subjunctive of πίομαι, and therefore as an invitation to drink. According to Agostiniani it should instead be interpreted as the numeral indicating the capacity of the kylix.

bibliography

  • Arena 2002 62, pl. XXII.1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001373
  • Agostiniani 1999 433 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002199
  • 29.0867 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • Manni Piraino 1980 1799, no. 35, pl. 9 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001765
